医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，第一次当爸爸的人比第二次当爸爸的人面临更严重的人际关系障碍研究表明，与第二次当爸爸的人相比，第一次当爸爸的人在过渡为人父母的过程中，关系满意度下降得更明显。该研究与之前对母亲的研究结果相呼应，表明夫妇在怀第一个孩子时应该做好应对关系挑战的准备。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/First-time-dads-face-steeper-relationship-hurdles-than-second-time-fathers-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/First-time-dads-face-steeper-relationship-hurdles-than-second-time-fathers-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33a6b76e-3a26-4d83-aac4-d5da387e05cc Mon, 04 Sep 2023 02:11:00 -0400 First-time dads face steeper relationship hurdles than second-time fathers, study finds
迷走神经刺激在降低应激激素醛固酮方面显示出不同的结果该研究探讨了急性经皮迷走神经刺激（tVNS）对年轻人和老年人血清醛固酮水平的影响。虽然活性 tVNS 确实导致醛固酮水平降低，但这些变化与假治疗中观察到的变化没有显着差异，醛固酮水平也因年龄和性别而异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Vagus-nerve-stimulation-shows-mixed-results-in-lowering-stress-hormone-aldosterone.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Vagus-nerve-stimulation-shows-mixed-results-in-lowering-stress-hormone-aldosterone.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2bbfca74-ea45-4ef8-9a85-b4ef40c447fa Mon, 04 Sep 2023 01:59:00 -0400 Vagus nerve stimulation shows mixed results in lowering stress hormone aldosterone
研究发现，睾酮生理机能不佳的男性前列腺癌结果更差对 266 名男性进行的首次研究发现，20% 的男性前列腺周围血管中的激素水平较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Men-with-sneaky-testosterone-physiology-have-worse-prostate-cancer-outcomes-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Men-with-sneaky-testosterone-physiology-have-worse-prostate-cancer-outcomes-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d340e57-9c4f-4fc3-9786-31096b9bfc5e Mon, 04 Sep 2023 01:53:02 -0400 Men with sneaky testosterone physiology have worse prostate cancer outcomes, study finds
澳大利亚爆发的穿孔感染可追溯到受污染的护理液澳大利亚新南威尔士州的研究人员利用基因组测序来追踪在特定批次的护理溶液中穿孔后铜绿假单胞菌感染的爆发。该研究导致了产品的召回和生产标准的改进，成功地减少了感染数量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Outbreak-of-piercing-infections-in-Australia-traced-to-contamerated-aftercare-solution.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Outbreak-of-piercing-infections-in-Australia-traced-to-contamerated-aftercare-solution.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=334646b1-52d5-4380-b7c4-5887c43134f9 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 01:48:00 -0400 Outbreak of piercing infections in Australia traced to contaminated aftercare solution
俄亥俄州立大学启动世界首个心力衰竭装置临床试验俄亥俄州立大学韦克斯纳医学中心周三在一项临床试验中对世界上第一位患者进行了随机分组，评估了一种旨在缓解心力衰竭症状的设备的有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Ohio-State-University-launches-first-in-world-clinical-trial-of-heart-failure-device.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Ohio-State-University-launches-first-in-world-clinical-trial-of-heart-failure-device.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0de92d90-7f8f-4baf-9dea-ab4deeeef201 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 01:32:06 -0400 Ohio State University launches first-in-world clinical trial of heart failure device
研究发现，强化禁食可增强红细胞针对 COVID-19 的免疫能力研究人员发现，短期强化禁食可以增强红细胞的免疫功能，包括其对抗 SARS-CoV-2 的能力，而不会影响其携氧能力。研究表明，这种在亚洲流行的禁食疗法可以通过增强身体的防御能力而不损害基本功能来提供多方面的好处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Intective-fasting-boosts-red-blood-cells-immune-powers-against-COVID-19-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Intective-fasting-boosts-red-blood-cells-immune-powers-against-COVID-19-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ecb8d31c-c395-4d46-853d-6bcf1af8baaa Mon, 04 Sep 2023 01:27:00 -0400 Intensive fasting boosts red blood cells' immune powers against COVID-19, study finds
呼吸系统疾病患者最容易受到气候变化的影响根据《欧洲呼吸杂志》今天（周一）发表的一份专家报告，患有哮喘和慢性阻塞性肺病 (COPD) 等肺部疾病的人面临着气候变化带来的更大风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Respiratory-病人-are-most-vulnerable-to-the-effects-of-climate-change.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Respiratory-病人-are-most-vulnerable-to-the-effects-of-climate-change.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=491479c4-df5b-4387-b2e8-0aac6a2f39eb Mon, 04 Sep 2023 00:53:29 -0400 Respiratory patients are most vulnerable to the effects of climate change
参加体育运动的儿童有更好的长期心理健康昆士兰大学研究人员领导的一项研究发现，从小就经常参加体育运动的儿童将拥有更好的长期心理健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Children-participating-in-sports-have-better-long-term-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230904/Children-participating-in-sports-have-better-long-term-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03ded640-9659-4703-8a12-7b47e5caeb44 Mon, 04 Sep 2023 00:33:02 -0400 Children participating in sports have better long term mental health
海洋缩醛磷脂能否成为对抗阿尔茨海默氏症和帕金森氏症的秘密武器？该研究论文回顾了海洋缩醛磷脂（一种甘油磷脂）在对抗阿尔茨海默氏症和帕金森氏症等与年龄相关的疾病方面的潜在益处。这些海洋资源丰富的化合物可以改善脂质代谢并减少氧化应激，为改善老龄化人群的生活质量提供新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230903/Could-marine-plasmalogens-be-the-secret-weapon-to-fight-Alzheimers-and-Parkinsons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230903/Could-marine-plasmalogens-be-the-secret-weapon-to-fight-Alzheimers-and-Parkinsons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e3d8596-faf9-4c0a-9720-d9e14147f288 Sun, 03 Sep 2023 22:55:00 -0400 Could marine plasmalogens be the secret weapon to fight Alzheimer's and Parkinson's?
数字技术可以解锁即将发生的心脏骤停的警告信号《柳叶刀数字健康》上的一项新研究确定了胸痛和呼吸困难等早期预警症状，这些症状与即将发生的心脏骤停有一定关系。研究表明，未来的数字技术可以将这些症状与生物识别数据结合起来，以更准确地预测并可能预防这些危及生命的事件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230903/Digital-tech-could-unlock-warning-signs-for-imminent-sudden-cardiac-arrest.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230903/Digital-tech-could-unlock-warning-signs-for-imminent-sudden-cardiac-arrest.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=703db3e4-702e-4d94-b958-19a667541d09 Sun, 03 Sep 2023 22:45:00 -0400 Digital tech could unlock warning signs for imminent sudden cardiac arrest
